name: Tiny Addons for WPBakery Page Builder
author: Sei Nakamura

sections.description:
Tiny Addons for WPBakery Page Builder aims to be a light, simple and bloat-free addon bundle for WordPress’ Layout Builder WPBakery Page Builder.

Values

  • Simple, bloat free and without obnoxious branding.
  • Minimal styles, customize it with your own CSS. Perfect for web designers.
  • Free, without premium version and nagware.

Current Addons

  • Card: This widget is intended as a two-toned card element. At the top you can upload your own background image, set an icon and a title. At the bottom you can use text, HTML, and also add a button.
  • Image Box: This widget is an image box element mostly used as a fancy way to link to other pages. You can set your background image, title, subtitle and link. It features a nice “zoom” animation when you hover.
  • Logo List: This widget outputs an inline list of images. It’s really useful as a featured clients list.
  • Widget for Facebook: This is the official widget of a Facebook Page. You must submit your Page Name, Page URL and Facebook App ID. It isn’t any different as embedding your own code but if you are building a website for someone else it is much cleaner to do it this way.
sections.installation:
1. You must have WPBakery Page Builder Installed. If not, please visit this site.
  2. In your Dashboard’s Sidebar go to Plugins and select ‘Add New’
  3. Search for ‘Tiny Addons for Visual Composer’ and install it.
  4. Now, when you are creating/editing a page you can click on the + icon to see your available addons. Tiny Addons should be there.
  5. Select your desired element, fill the information and save the changes.
  6. Now visit your site.
sections.faq:
The plugin is activated, but I can’t see it

This plugin builds onto WPBakery Page Builder, so you must install it first. If WPBakery is already installed and activated it may be a Tiny Addons’ problem. Please contact support at nakamurasei.com/tiny.

I have a problem or I want to ask for a feature

Please visit nakamurasei.com/tiny for support or feature request. Please take note that this is a free addon, so response may not be inmediate.

I would like to donate to this project

Please visit nakamurasei.com/tiny for donation options. You can support the development of this addon with PayPal, Bitcoin and Bitcoin Cash and Brave Browser.
sections.changelog:
0.3

  • Initial release

0.4

  • Card widget vastly improved
  • CSS Properties tab added on all widgets
  • Translation strings (Spanish, English)

0.5

  • Solved a problem when loading translation files.

short_description: Adds useful elements to WPBakery Page Builder. Build awesome websites with these light, simple and bloat-free widgets.
